channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Xerces
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Xerces

item.title: CVE-2022-23437|2024-08-03T03:43:45.690Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20xerces
item.description: There's a vulnerability within the Apache Xerces Java (XercesJ) XML parser when handling specially crafted XML document payloads. This causes, the XercesJ XML parser to wait in an infinite loop, which may sometimes consume system resources for prolonged duration. This vulnerability is present within XercesJ version 2.12.1 and the previous versions.
